snippet.title: Audioshield first look, VR mixed-reality
snippet.description:
Audioshield launches April 2016
http://store.steampowered.com/app/412740
...
This is a mixed-reality video using a green-screen to capture the player and integrate that footage into the game. Thanks to the Fantastic Contraption team for coming up with this idea!
http://www.twitch.tv/colinnorthway/

Audioshield works with any song. This song is Vortal Combat by Valve.
